Execute.Command: INSERT INTO Sales (StoreId, ProductId, Date, Units, Price) SELECT tmpRandom.StoreId, tmpRandom.ProductId, @SaleDate, CAST(10 + -10 * abs(1.0 * random() / (random() + 1)) AS int) AS Units, tmpRandom.Price + 10 * abs(1.0 * random() / (random() + 1)) AS Price FROM ((SELECT StoreId FROM Stores ORDER BY random() LIMIT 150) AS tmpStores CROSS JOIN (SELECT ProductId, Price FROM Products ORDER BY random() LIMIT 100) AS tmpProducts ) AS tmpRandom;
